attributes.action: Response to the EU referendum: Marriage for all
attributes.additional_details: I, as a citizen of the United Kingdom, do not understand the complexities of the European Union. If you go ahead with a referendum on whether the UK should stay as a member of the EU, something that the majority of British citizens do not understand, I ask that you please hold a referendum stating that people of all backgrounds should have the right to a full marriage in both name as well as rights. This is something that I understand and believe should happen. Together we can make this a better world.
